title: Super Bowl LIV Gambling Preview: Picks, Props, DFS Advice for 49ers-Chiefs (Football 1/31)
description:
Listen for everything you need to know to gamble on Super Bowl LIV! First, Will Brinson is joined by Pete Prisco and R.J. White to go over 10 top picks & props for Sunday (4:30). Next, Will chats with Ryan Wilson and John Breech on some of the quirkier prop bets for the 49ers and Chiefs (33:00). Finally, Heath Cummings hops on the podcast to offer DFS advice (41:45).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: Will Brinson and guests make picks and offer gambling advice for Super Bowl LIV between the 49ers and Chiefs.
